scenes.description: MC segment before the final song performance.
Performance of the group song "Kiseki Musubi".

subtitles.original: どろっどろだったけど
subtitles.english: It was a complete mess but

subtitles.original: 明るく
subtitles.english: brightly,

subtitles.original: うん
subtitles.english: yeah.

subtitles.original: 最後は明るくね
subtitles.english: Let's end on a bright note.

subtitles.original: うん
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: 一緒に
subtitles.english: Together.

subtitles.original: 笑顔で
subtitles.english: With a smile.

subtitles.original: 笑顔でね
subtitles.english: With a smile.

subtitles.original: みんなと一緒にね
subtitles.english: With everyone together.

subtitles.original: だから
subtitles.english: So,

subtitles.original: みんなも一緒に歌ってください
subtitles.english: please everyone sing along too.

subtitles.original: それでは
subtitles.english: And now,

subtitles.original: キセキ結び
subtitles.english: Kiseki Musubi.

subtitles.original: キセキ結び / 作詞・作曲：天音かなた 編曲：ハム
subtitles.english: Kiseki Musubi / Lyrics & Music: Amane Kanata Arrangement: Hamu

subtitles.original: 約束しよう 僕ら出会えた奇跡
subtitles.english: Let's make a promise, the miracle that brought us together

subtitles.original: 忘れないように
subtitles.english: So we never forget it

subtitles.original: 夢描いて集う
subtitles.english: Gathering to draw our dreams,

subtitles.original: 最終アニメみたいな
subtitles.english: like the final episode of an anime,

subtitles.original: ハッピーなエンドになる彼方へ飛ぶよ
subtitles.english: we'll fly towards a happy ending in the distance.

subtitles.original: 眠気あくびして
subtitles.english: Yawning from sleepiness,

subtitles.original: 今日は何をしようか
subtitles.english: what shall we do today?

subtitles.original: 常世に続く海を駆け抜ける
subtitles.english: Running through the sea that stretches for eternity.

subtitles.original: 今は溜息よりも勇気を
subtitles.english: For now, have courage rather than sighs.

subtitles.original: 諦めるなんてないの ここで歌う
subtitles.english: There's no giving up, we'll sing right here.

subtitles.original: 僕の声は聞こえてますか
subtitles.english: Can you hear my voice?

subtitles.original: 君に届け
subtitles.english: May it reach you.

subtitles.original: 学校の友達じゃ きっと出会い得なかった
subtitles.english: If we were school friends, we never would have met.

subtitles.original: 画面の先の遥か遠くまで
subtitles.english: To the far reaches beyond the screen,

subtitles.original: 笹くれた言葉も 誰かの笑顔になる
subtitles.english: even splintered words will bring a smile to someone.

subtitles.original: それぞれの色で 星結ぶ奇跡
subtitles.english: Tracing the stars with our own colors,

subtitles.original: キラキラ輝くステージに 連れて行くよ
subtitles.english: I'll take you to the sparkling stage.

subtitles.original: 泣いて笑って燥いで 毎日ジェットコースター
subtitles.english: Crying, laughing, having fun, every day is a roller coaster.

subtitles.original: たまには寝転んでお昼寝しよう
subtitles.english: Let's lie down and nap once in a while.

subtitles.original: ちょっと自信ない時 琴りとデュエットして
subtitles.english: When you lack confidence, duet with a bird.

subtitles.original: 今日だけは泣いちゃうこと 許してね
subtitles.english: Please forgive me for crying just for today.

subtitles.original: 未来の僕がアルバム開く
subtitles.english: My future self will open the album.

subtitles.original: 傷ついた写真だって 宝物だ
subtitles.english: Even the photos of being hurt are treasures.

subtitles.original: 僕の愛が見えていますか
subtitles.english: Can you see my love?

subtitles.original: 君に届け
subtitles.english: May it reach you.

subtitles.original: 格好も個性も 性格も違うけれど
subtitles.english: Our looks, individuality, and personalities are different, but

subtitles.original: 弱気な時は瞼 ぎゅっと瞑り
subtitles.english: when feeling weak, close your eyes tight.

subtitles.original: もう一回 もう一回 絶対に諦めない
subtitles.english: One more time, one more time, I'll never give up.

subtitles.original: 前の背中追う 下手っぴな僕でも
subtitles.english: Even if I'm unskillful, following the back in front of me,

subtitles.original: 君の隣に行きたくて 走るの
subtitles.english: I run because I want to be by your side.

subtitles.original: 誰にも言えずに描いた夢が たとえ叶わないとしても
subtitles.english: Even if the dream I drew in secret doesn't come true,

subtitles.original: ボロボロの靴でも 格好良くなくても
subtitles.english: even with worn-out shoes, even if I'm not cool,

subtitles.original: 幼いあの日の僕なら何て言う？ 止まらないで
subtitles.english: what would my younger self say? "Don't stop."

subtitles.original: 初めて僕ら出会った日 まるで
subtitles.english: The day we first met feels just like

subtitles.original: 昨日のように 思い出すけど
subtitles.english: yesterday, when I look back on it.

subtitles.original: ああ行こうか
subtitles.english: Ah, shall we go?

subtitles.original: 最後に今 重なる五人の奇跡
subtitles.english: Finally now, the miracle of the five overlapping.

subtitles.original: 僕の声は聞こえてますか
subtitles.english: Can you hear my voice?

subtitles.original: 君に届け
subtitles.english: May it reach you.

subtitles.original: 黒板のメッセージ 桜の風抜けて
subtitles.english: The message on the blackboard, passing through the cherry blossom wind,

subtitles.original: 僕らの声を聞いて ずっとずっと
subtitles.english: listen to our voices, forever and ever.

subtitles.original: 嬉しい日 楽しい日 哀しい日 別れの日も
subtitles.english: Happy days, fun days, sad days, even the day of parting,

subtitles.original: それぞれの色で 星結ぶ奇跡
subtitles.english: tracing the stars with our own colors.

subtitles.original: キラキラ輝くステージで 約束しよう
subtitles.english: Let's make a promise on the sparkling stage.

subtitles.original: いつかここで また会おう
subtitles.english: Let's meet here again someday.

subtitles.original: 終わったー！
subtitles.english: It's over!

subtitles.original: やりきったー！
subtitles.english: We did it!

subtitles.original: 言葉がなくなってしまいました
subtitles.english: I've run out of words.

subtitles.original: 本当に
subtitles.english: Truly.

subtitles.original: 歌って
subtitles.english: Singing...

subtitles.original: トワ、元気か？
subtitles.english: Towa, you okay?

subtitles.original: 元気！
subtitles.english: Energetic!

subtitles.original: 元気！
subtitles.english: Energetic!

subtitles.original: 元気だよ本当に最後
subtitles.english: I'm really energetic at the very end.
